settings.info: Sets the default width of the content area (Default: 1320px)

settings.info: Only work when "Show popup login customer" is enabled

settings.default: You must be 18 years of age or older to view page. Please verify your age to enter.

settings.content: Identify the font source used in the website.

settings.label: Action when an item is added to the cart

options.label: No action, stay on the current page

settings.label: Text
settings.default: Do you want a gift wrap?

settings.label: Active
settings.info: Free shipping will be applied when the cart total is greater than or equal to the amount specified below.

settings.label: Amount
settings.info: The amount of the order that must be reached before free shipping is applied.

settings.label: Discount code
settings.info: You need to create a free shipping discount code in Discounts/Create Discount

settings.label: Text after free shipping
settings.info: Text displayed when orders are not eligible for free shipping promotion

settings.label: Congratulations text
settings.info: Text display congratulations when orders are eligible to receive free shipping promotions

settings.label: Message
settings.default: This website uses cookies to make sure you get the best experience with us.

settings.label: Agree Button Text
settings.info: E.g: Got it!, Allow Cookies, I Accept, OK, Approve.

settings.label: Custom css
settings.info: Be careful - css can affect the interface of your website. Make sure you have your css under control before you include it

separated by commas, e.g: Shirt,

Short Description
settings.default: Subscribe to our newsletter to be informed about our latest products and promotions

settings.label: Do not show again popup confirm text
settings.default: Do not show this popup again

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .
